title: Odd mana rune costs?
body: Why do mana regen glyphs cost more than marks and seals, while being in between the two in terms of effectiveness? I don't think there are any other runes that have no correlation between cost and effectiveness...

replies.body:
Because generally speaking you would rather the Mana Regen be in your glyphs over your marks or seals.

Seals you want HP/HP per level/Armor
Marks you want Whatever offensive shit you want
Glyphs are kinda the ones that have some variability when it comes to using runes effectively.
Poor AD... They have to deal with inefficient glyphs while the AP get AP Glyphs.

Honestly AD is easier then AP.

AP have to give up MR to have AP Blues, AD have to give up nothing to have AD/Armor pen/AS Reds.

Damn that's true. I just take AP/lvl for my blues, mana regen for my yellows, and mpen for my reds. I never really need much defense when I have a trusty potion by my side
